text: Rainbow jersey The men's 1 km time trial was part of the 2011 UCI Para-cycling Track World Championships, held in Montichiari, Italy in March 2011. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | bgcolor=efefef|Class||width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |C1 |Rodrigo López '''' |Chris Jaco Nel '''' |Jaye Miley '''' |- |C2 |Gui Hua Liang '''' |Andrew Panazzolo '''' |Tobias Graf '''' |- |C3 |Darren Kenny '''' |Richard Waddon '''' |Amador Granados '''' |- |C4 |Jody Cundy '''' |Terry Byrne '''' |Jirí Bouška '''' |- |C5 |Jon-Allan Butterworth '''' |Vincent Juarez '''' |Pablo Jaramillo Gallardo '''' |- |B |Neil Fachie, Craig MacLean '''' |Anthony Kappes, Barney Storey '''' |Jose Enrique Porto Lareo, Jose Antonio Villanueva Trinidad '''' |} ==C1== The Final was held on 12 March.Men's 1 km Time Trial C1 - Results, Union Cycliste Internationale (UCI) *C1 - locomotor disability: Neurological, or amputation ===Final=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
